__e: Which, of course, actually explains why you would suddenly want to go into business with your stinky old sister.
Look, maybe the only reason he can be so unpleasant is because we expect him to be.
What was even more unpleasant though was thinking about where that fat was heading for.
I know he seems cold and off-putting, but once you get to know him...
So I've spent my day trying to think of a erm... a not unpleasant way to say it, but I suspect that there isn't one.
People say exactly what they think, and sometimes that can come across as a bit harsh. But they've got no choice in the matter.
